attributes.action: Make basic millitary training apart of compulsory education,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After completion they will stay on the reserve list for a minimum of 4 years, While separating the territorial to volunteer reserves, (which can get sent away on tours as the government pleases), and the reserves who are only needed for a time of a mass conflict.

This should make our army one of the biggest army's in the world, With it's reserves reaching over 10 million in 10 years.
Which should increase respect for us across the world and match other army's which is a threat to our free country
